column6:
It's DEADPOOL vs. SPIDER-MAN!! It's the wisecracking face-off of a lifetime-a veritable smart#$% smackdown! What brought them together? We're not telling! Who will win? Hopefully, Spidey, since at the least he'd let DP keep breathing. Wait-what's that you ask? Of course there's a REASON why they're fighting...and it's guaranteed to make sense!,2006,1
But does it matter? It's DEADPOOL vs. SPIDER-MAN!!
32 PGS./T+ SUGGESTED FOR TEENS AND UP...$2.99
column8: | inker:Udon Comics | colorist:Gotham Entertainment Group | writer:Fabian Nicieza | letterer:Cory Petit | penciller (cover):Patrick Zircher
